episodes.title: Survivor 45 Finalist & Civil Rights Lawyer: Katurah Topps’ Journey (2024) | Break Into Law School®
episodes.description:
Topps, shares her extraordinary life journey. Raised in a religious cult, she escaped at 14, defied societal norms, and became a successful civil rights lawyer. Katurah discusses her Survivor experience, emphasizing the importance of representation and her commitment to empowering marginalized voices. Her resilience, despite adversity, serves as inspiration for others considering paths in law or advocacy. Join us as we delve into her Survivor experience, the challenges she faced, and her ongoing dedication to civil rights.

Connect with Katurah:
YouTube: @katurahtopps

Twitter: @katurahtopps

Break Into Law School® is a brand of Barrier Breakers®, a non-profit organization that specializes in supporting BIPOC, first-generation, and other marginalized students on their path to becoming a lawyer. We have helped over 7,000 students throughout the law school admissions process and beyond. 

To stay up to date with events for incoming and current law students, visit breakintolaw.org.

If you're interested in working with us on your law school applications, learn more about our services for law school students at law.barrier-breakers.org.

Chapters:
00:00 Introduction
00:50 Katurah’s Journey to Civil Rights Law
07:03 Typical Day as a Civil Rights Attorney
11:30 Survivor Strategies

18:00 Words of Encouragement for Prospective Law Students
22:40 Haircare during Survivor
24:30 Post-Elimination Reaction
29:00 Outro
